kpi_info.title: TWAMP_PACKETS_LOST
kpi_info.use: The number of sent TWAMP measurement request packets for which no response was received until the timeout expired. The timeout is the same as packet sending interval, that is either 1 second or 100 milliseconds depending on the operator configured TWAMP session parameter. UPDATED: When the RNC works as a TWAMP sender and does not receive response to TWAMP measurement request packet and timeout expires.
